subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to fulfill key functions of government for recovery in early post-crisis situations
subproject.description: 1) Strengthen the coordination role of the Government in the response initiatives a cross the country, 2) Enhance the capacity of the Governement to conduct assessment on the impact of the floods and identify early recovery response activities. 3) Develop a continued recovery programme proposal beyond the initial 6 months period.
subproject.title: 3KEN10301Enhanced Capacity for
